channel.title: Gstreamer on Victor Toso
channel.description: Recent content in Gstreamer on Victor Toso

item.title: New ways to remote desktops with GStreamer integration
item.description: Once again at DevConf CZ but now to talk about SPICE and its integration with GStreamer. Together with my friend and colleague Pavel Grunt we give a brief explanation about how SPICE works and then we focus on the image display and video streaming part of SPICE protocol while trying to clarify why streaming is so important to remote desktops. Video Slides

Together with my friend and colleague Pavel Grunt we give a brief explanation about how SPICE works and then we focus on the image display and video streaming part of SPICE protocol while trying to clarify why streaming is so important to remote desktops. Video Slides
